featureDescriptions.Color of this light expressed as hue/sat: 这盏灯的颜色以色相/饱和度表示
featureDescriptions.Color of this light in the CIE 1931 colo: 这盏灯在CIE 1931色彩空间中的颜色(x/y)
featureDescriptions.Color temperature after cold power on of: 这盏灯冷启动后的色温
featureDescriptions.Controls the behavior when the device is: 控制设备通电后的行为
featureDescriptions.Controls the behaviour when the device i: 控制设备通电后的行为
featureDescriptions.Current temperature measured on the devi: 在设备上测量的当前温度
featureDescriptions.Decoupled mode for center button: 中键的转无线开关模式
featureDescriptions.Decoupled mode for left button: 左键的转无线开关模式
featureDescriptions.Decoupled mode for right button: 右键的转无线开关模式
featureDescriptions.Enables/disables physical input on the d: 启用/禁用设备上的物理输入
featureDescriptions.Enables/disables window detection on the: 启用/禁用设备上的窗口检测
featureDescriptions.Enabling prevents both relais being on a: 启用后可防止两个继电器同时开启
featureDescriptions.Indicates if CO (carbon monoxide) is det: 表明是否检测到CO（一氧化碳）
featureDescriptions.Indicates if the battery of this device: 表明该设备的电池是否快用完了
featureDescriptions.Indicates if the contact is closed (= tr: 表明门磁是否关闭（=true）或打开（=false）
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected a: 表明设备是否检测到漏水
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected oc: 表明设备是否检测到占用情况
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected sm: 表明设备是否检测到烟雾
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device is tampered: 表明设备是否被篡改了
featureDescriptions.Triggered action (e.g. a button click): 触发的行动 (例如，点击按钮)
featureDescriptions.Triggers an effect on the light (e.g. ma: 触发灯光的效果 (例如，使灯光闪烁几秒钟)
featureDescriptions.Boost Heating: press and hold \"+\" for: 升压加热：按住 "+"键3秒，设备将进入升压加热模式，▷╵◁将闪烁。倒计时将显示在APP中
featureDescriptions.Boost Time Setting 100 sec - 900 sec, (d: 升压时间设置100秒-900秒，（默认=300秒）
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the humidity value (absolute: 校准湿度值（绝对偏移），在设备的下次报告中生效。
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the illuminance value (percen: 校准照度值（按比例偏移），在设备的下一次报告中生效。
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the illuminance_lux value (pe: 校准照度值（按比例偏移），在设备的下一次报告中生效。
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the pressure value (absolute: 校准压力值（绝对偏移），在设备的下次报告中生效。
featureDescriptions.Calibrates the temperature value (absolu: 校准温度值（绝对偏移），在设备的下次报告中生效。
featureDescriptions.Countdown in minutes: 以分钟为单位的倒计时
featureDescriptions.Direction of movement from the point of: 从雷达的角度看运动的方向
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected pr: 表示设备是否检测到存在
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected vi: 表示设备是否检测到振动
featureDescriptions.Moving inside the range of the sensor: 在传感器的范围内移动
featureDescriptions.Number of digits after decimal point for: 湿度的小数点后的数字，在设备的下次报告中生效。
照度的小数点后的数字，在设备的下次报告中生效。
照度 (勒克斯) 小数点后的数字，在设备的下次报告中生效。
气压的小数点后的数字，在设备的下一次报告中生效。
温度的小数点后的数字，在设备的下一次报告中生效。
featureDescriptions.Presets for sensivity for presence and m: 预设对存在和运动的敏感度
featureDescriptions.PROGRAMMING MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the d: 编程模式 ⏱ - 在这种模式下，设备执行预设的一周编程温度时间和温度。
featureDescriptions.Sends a message the last time occupancy: 发出最后一次检测到占用情况的信息。例如，当设置为[10, 60]时，10秒后将发送`{"no_occupancy_since": 10}`将在10秒后发送，`{"no_occupancy_since": 60}`在60秒后发送。
featureDescriptions.Set to false to disable the legacy integ: 设置为false以禁用传统的集成（强烈推荐），将改变发布的有效载荷的结构（默认为true）。
featureDescriptions.Schedule MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the devi: 计划模式⏱ - 在这种模式下，设备执行预设的一周编程温度时间和温度。
featureDescriptions.This device does not support reporting e: 该设备不支持报告电测值，所以它被轮询代替。默认的轮询间隔是60秒。
featureDescriptions.Time in seconds after which occupancy is: 检测到占用后复位的时间，单位为秒（默认为90秒）。
featureDescriptions.Time in seconds after which vibration is: 检测到振动后复位的时间，单位为秒（默认为90秒）。
featureDescriptions.Controls the transition time (in seconds: 控制开/关、亮度、色温（如果适用）和颜色（如果适用）变化的过渡时间（秒）。默认为 "0"（无过渡）。
featureDescriptions.Simulate a brightness value. If this dev: 模拟一个亮度值。如果这个设备提供了一个brightness_move_up或brightness_move_down动作，就可以指定更新时间间隔和delta。
featureDescriptions.Operation mode, select \"command\" to en: 操作模式，选择 "命令 "以启用绑定功能
当启用时，颜色将被同步，例如，如果灯光同时支持颜色x/y和色温，在设置x/y颜色时，将从颜色x/y转换到色温（默认为true）。
featureDescriptions.Position of the valve (= demanded heat): 阀门的位置（=需求的热量），其中0%为完全关闭，100%为完全打开
featureDescriptions.User ID to set or clear the pincode for: 用于设置或清空密码的用户ID。
featureDescriptions.Type of user, unrestrictied: owner (defa: 用户类型，非限制性：所有者（默认），（年|周）_日_日程：用户有能力根据特定的时间段打开锁，主：用户有能力同时编程和操作门锁，非访问：用户被锁识别，但没有能力打开锁。
featureDescriptions.Pincode to set, set pincode to null to c: 要设置的PIN，将PIN设置为空以清除
featureDescriptions.Click mode, fast: only supports single c: 点击模式，快速：只支持单次点击，点击后会立即发送，多重：支持更多事件，如双击和长按
点击模式，快速：只支持单次点击，点击后会立即发送，多重：支持更多事件，如双击和长按
featureDescriptions.Enable/disable the power outage memory,: 启用/禁用断电记忆，这可以在断电后恢复开/关模式
featureDescriptions.Maximum allowed load, turns off if excee: 允许的最大负荷，如果超过就会关闭
featureDescriptions.Control both relay and usb or only the r: 同时控制继电器和USB或只用物理开关按钮控制继电器
featureDescriptions.Time interval in seconds to report after: 光线变化后报告的时间间隔（秒）
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether a plug is physically a: 表明插头是否被物理连接。设备不需要拉动电源，甚至不需要电气连接（即使主电源开关关闭，该二进制开关的状态也可以是ON）。
featureDescriptions.Anti flicker mode can be used to solve b: 防闪烁模式可用于解决某些灯的闪烁问题。快速模式使设备的反应更快。
featureDescriptions.Decoupled mode for button: 按钮的转无线开关模式
featureDescriptions.Operation mode, select \"command\" to en: 操作模式，选择 "命令 "以启用绑定（在改变模式前唤醒设备！）。
featureDescriptions.LCD brightness (will not persist if auto: LCD亮度（如果启用了自动亮度，将不会保持）。
featureDescriptions.Control which switches are available in: 控制哪些开关在开关屏幕中可用（无则禁用开关屏幕）
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected ga: 表示设备是否检测到气体
featureDescriptions.If the power is constantly lower than 2W: 如果半小时内功率持续低于2W，插头将自动关闭。
featureDescriptions.Device temperature (polled every 30 min): 设备温度（每30分钟轮询一次）
featureDescriptions.Turn the device automatically off when a: 当连接的设备在20分钟内消耗低于2W时，自动关闭设备
featureDescriptions.Time in seconds till occupancy goes to f: 占用率转为 false 的时间，以秒为单位
featureDescriptions.Detected by sudden temperature drop or s: 通过温度突然下降或手动设置来检测。
featureDescriptions.Represents the time taken to move to or: 代表当一个开/关集群收到开/关命令时，移动到目标层或从目标层移动的时间。
featureDescriptions.Represents the time taken to move the cu: 代表在收到开的命令时，将当前水平从最低水平移到最高水平所需的时间。
代表在收到 "关闭 "命令时，将当前级别从最高级别移动到最低级别所需的时间。
featureDescriptions.Defines the desired startup level for a: 定义了设备在供电时所需的启动水平。
featureDescriptions.Specifies the minimum light output the b: 指定镇流器能达到的最小光输出。
featureDescriptions.Specifies the maximum light output the b: 指定镇流器能达到的最大光输出。
featureDescriptions.Specifies the minimum light output of th: 指定镇流器的最小光输出
featureDescriptions.Specifies the maximum light output of th: 指定镇流器的最大光输出
featureDescriptions.Specifies the minimum light output after: 指定开启后的最小光输出
featureDescriptions.The dimmer supports AC forward phase con: 该调光器支持交流正向相位控制。
featureDescriptions.The dimmer supports AC reverse phase con: 该调光器支持交流逆相控制。
featureDescriptions.The dimmer is capable of measuring the r: 调光器能够测量电抗，以区分感性和容性负载。
featureDescriptions.The dimmer is capable of replacing the b: 该调光器能够取代内置的、默认的调光曲线。
featureDescriptions.The dimmer is capable of detecting an ou: 调光器能够检测到输出过载并关闭输出。
featureDescriptions.The dimmer is currently operating in AC: 调光器目前是在交流正向相位控制模式下工作。
调光器目前是在交流反相控制模式下工作。
featureDescriptions.The output is currently turned off, beca: 调光器检测到过载，输出关闭
featureDescriptions.The dimmer's reactance discriminator had: 调光器的电抗鉴别器检测到一个电容性负载。
调光器的电抗鉴别器检测到了一个电感性负载。
featureDescriptions.Operation mode: \"command\" - for group: 操作模式: "命令"-用于群控，"事件"-用于点击
featureDescriptions.moving inside the range of the sensor: 在传感器的范围内移动
featureDescriptions.direction of movement from the point of: direction of movement from the point of view of the radar
featureDescriptions.presets for sensivity for presence and m: presets for sensivity for presence and movement
featureDescriptions.Device valve is open or closed (heating: 设备阀门打开或关闭（加热或不加热）。
featureDescriptions.MANUAL MODE ☝ - In this mode, the device: 手动模式☝ - 在这种模式下，设备执行手动温度设定。当设定温度低于 "最低温度 "时，阀门关闭（强制关闭）。自动模式 ⏱ - 在这种模式下，设备执行预设的一周编程温度时间和温度。ON - 在这种模式下，温控器保持开放状态 OFF - 在这种模式下，温控器保持关闭状态
featureDescriptions.Auto MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the device e: 自动模式⏱ - 在这种模式下，设备执行预设的一周编程温度时间和温度。
featureDescriptions.Enables/disables the status on the devic: 启用/禁用设备上的状态
featureDescriptions.Setting minimum 0 - maximum 465 seconds: 设置最小0-最大465秒的增压时间。增压（♨）功能被激活。该功能的剩余时间将以秒为单位倒计时（465到0）。
featureDescriptions.When Anti-Freezing function is activated: 当防冻功能被激活时，屋内温度保持在8℃'设备显示 "AF".按配对按钮取消。
featureDescriptions.Battery life can be prolonged by switchi: 通过关闭加热装置，可以延长电池的使用寿命。为了实现这一点，阀门要完全关闭。要激活加热停止，设备显示 "HS"'按配对按钮即可取消。
featureDescriptions.The holiday mode( ⛱ ) will automatically: 假日模式（⛱）将在设定的时间起点自动启动并运行假日温度。
featureDescriptions.Auto Mode ⏱ - In this mode, the device e: 自动模式⏱ - 在这种模式下，设备执行预设的一周编程温度时间和温度。
featureDescriptions.Turn on/off the strobe (light) during wa: 警告时打开/关闭频闪（灯）。
featureDescriptions.Control status LED when load ON: 负载开启时的控制状态LED
featureDescriptions.Control status LED when load OFF: 负载关闭时的控制状态LED
featureDescriptions.Control minimum dimmer brightness: 控制最小的调光器亮度
featureDescriptions.Control backlight dimming behavior: 控制背光灯的调光行为
featureDescriptions.Icon shown on device displays: 设备显示屏上显示的图标
featureDescriptions.Controls Capacitive or Inductive Dimming: 控制电容式或感应式调光模式
featureDescriptions.Auto off after specific time: 在特定的时间自动关闭
featureDescriptions.Time the valve was open when state on: 状态开启时阀门打开的时间
featureDescriptions.Is the unit in mounting mode. This is se: 设备是否处于安装模式。如果已经安装（已经在散热器上），则设置为 "false"；如果没有安装（在工厂复位后），则设置为 "true"。
featureDescriptions.Set the unit mounting mode. `false` Go t: 设置设备安装模式。`false`转为安装模式或`true`转为安装模式
featureDescriptions.Thermostat Orientation. This is importan: 温控器方向。这对PID评估温度的方式很重要。`false`水平或`true`垂直
featureDescriptions.Viewing/Display Direction. `false` Horiz: 查看/显示方向。`false`水平或`true`垂直
featureDescriptions.Not clear how this affects operation. `f: 不清楚这对操作有什么影响。`false`加热不可用或`true`加热可用
featureDescriptions.Whether or not the unit needs warm water: Whether or not the unit needs warm water. `false` No Heat Request or `true` Heat Request
featureDescriptions.Set at maximum 3 hours interval but not: Set at maximum 3 hours interval but not more often than every 30 minutes and 0.1 degrees difference. Resets every 3hours to standard. e.g. 21C = 2100 (-8000=undefined).
featureDescriptions.0=Quarantine, 1=Windows are closed, 2=Ho: 0=Quarantine, 1=Windows are closed, 2=Hold - Windows are maybe about to open, 3=Open window detected, 4=In window open state from external but detected closed locally
featureDescriptions.Set if the window is open or close. This: Set if the window is open or close. This setting will trigger a change in the internal window and heating demand. `false` (windows are closed) or `true` (windows are open)
featureDescriptions.Exercise trigger time. Minutes since mid: Exercise trigger time. Minutes since midnight (65535=undefined). Range 0 to 1439
featureDescriptions.Scale factor of setpoint filter timecons: Scale factor of setpoint filter timeconstant ("aggressiveness" of control algorithm) 1= Quick ...  5=Moderate ... 10=Slow
featureDescriptions.Whether or not the thermostat acts as st: Whether or not the thermostat acts as standalone thermostat or shares load with other thermostats in the room. The gateway must update load_room_mean if enabled.
featureDescriptions.Mean radiator load for room calculated b: Mean radiator load for room calculated by gateway for load balancing purposes
featureDescriptions.Blink green LED on motion detection: 监测到活动时绿灯闪烁
featureDescriptions.Ac louver position of this device: Ac louver position of this device
featureDescriptions.Enables/disables frost detection on the: 开启/关闭设备上的烟雾传感器
featureDescriptions.MANUAL MODE ☝ - In this mode, the device: MANUAL MODE ☝ - In this mode, the device executes manual temperature setting. When the set temperature is lower than the "minimum temperature", the valve is closed (forced closed). PROGRAMMING MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the device executes a preset week programming temperature time and temperature. HOLIDAY MODE ⛱ - In this mode, for example, the vacation mode is set for 10 days and the temperature is setto 15 degrees Celsius. After 10 days, the device will automatically switch to programming mode. TEMPORARY MANUAL MODE - In this mode, ☝ icon will flash. At this time, the device executes the manually set temperature and returns to the weekly programming mode in the next time period.
featureDescriptions.PROGRAMMING MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the d: PROGRAMMING MODE ⏱ - In this mode, the device executes a preset week programming temperature time and temperature. You can set up to 4 stages of temperature every for WEEKDAY ➀➁➂➃➄,  SATURDAY ➅ and SUNDAY ➆.
featureDescriptions.The delta between local_temperature and: The delta between local_temperature and current_heating_setpoint to trigger Heat. 1-5
featureDescriptions.Select temperature sensor to use: 选择所需使用的温度传感器
featureDescriptions.Controls behaviour of led/siren on alarm: Controls behaviour of LED/siren on alarm
featureDescriptions.Enable or disable the permanent blue LED: Enable or disable the permanent blue LED
featureDescriptions.Enables the LED when the light is on: Enables the LED when the light is on
featureDescriptions.On/off (works only if device is in \"swi: On/off (works only if device is in "switch" mode)
featureDescriptions.switch: allow on/off, auto will use wire: switch: allow on/off, auto will use wired action via C1/C2 on teleruptor with buttons
switch: allow on/off, auto will use wired action via C1/C2 on contactor for example with HC/HP
featureDescriptions.Filter is older than 6 months and needs: Filter is older than 6 months and needs replacing
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device detected br: Indicates whether the device detected bright light (works only in night mode)
Prevent changes. `false` = run normally. `true` = prevent from making changes. Must be set to `false` when system_mode = off or `true` for heat
featureDescriptions.Period in minutes for which the setpoint: Period in minutes for which the setpoint hold will be active. 65535 = attribute not used. 0 to 360 to match the remote display
featureDescriptions.Select between direct control of the val: Select between direct control of the valve via the `valve_position` or automatic control of the valve based on the `current_heating_setpoint`. For manual control set the value to 1, for automatic control set the value to 2 (the default). When switched to manual mode the display shows a value from 0 (valve closed) to 100 (valve fully open) and the buttons on the device are disabled.
featureDescriptions.Directly control the radiator valve when: Directly control the radiator valve when `trv_mode` is set to 1. The values range from 0 (valve closed) to 255 (valve fully open)
featureDescriptions.Displayed text on thermostat display (zo: Displayed text on thermostat display (zone). Max 14 characters
featureDescriptions.Load in W when heating is on (between 0-: Load in W when heating is on (between 0-2000 W). The thermostat uses the value as input to the mean_power calculation.
Device in regulator or thermostat mode.
featureDescriptions.When device is in regulator mode this co: When device is in regulator mode this controls the time between each in/out connection. When device is in thermostat mode this controls the  time between each in/out switch when measured temperature is within +-0.5 °C set temperature. Choose a long time for (slow) concrete floors and a short time for (quick) wooden floors.
featureDescriptions.Current temperature measured from the fl: Current temperature measured from the floor sensor
featureDescriptions.Set max floor temperature (between 20-35: Set max floor temperature (between 20-35 °C) when "supervisor_floor" is set
featureDescriptions.Reports average power usage last 10 minu: Reports average power usage last 10 minutes
featureDescriptions.When frost guard is ON, it is activated: When frost guard is ON, it is activated when the thermostat is switched OFF with the ON/OFF button.At the same time, the display will fade and the text "Frostsikring x °C" appears in the display and remains until the thermostat is switched on again.
featureDescriptions.Time after last bell to finish ring: Time after last bell to finish ring
featureDescriptions.Current count radioactive pulses per min: Current count radioactive pulses per minute
featureDescriptions.This is applicable if tubes type is set: This is applicable if tubes type is set to other
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device is being te: Indicates whether the device is being tested
featureDescriptions.Turn on/off the strobe (light) for Squaw: Turn on/off the strobe (light) for Squawk
featureDescriptions.Pulses per kwh. Default 1000 imp/kWh. Ra: 每千瓦时脉冲数.默认为每千瓦时1000次脉冲.设置范围为0~65535
featureDescriptions.Current summation value sent to the disp: Current summation value sent to the display. e.g. 570 = 0,570 kWh
featureDescriptions.Is true if communication problem with me: Is true if communication problem with meter is experienced
featureDescriptions.Indicates whether the device are in faul: Indicates whether the device are in fault state
featureDescriptions.Instantaneous measured electrical curren: Instantaneous measured electrical current on phase B
featureDescriptions.Measured electrical potential value on p: Measured electrical potential value on phase B
featureDescriptions.Instantaneous measured electrical curren: Instantaneous measured electrical current on phase C
featureDescriptions.Measured electrical potential value on p: Measured electrical potential value on phase C
featureDescriptions.Absolute min temperature allowed on the: Absolute min temperature allowed on the device
featureDescriptions.Absolute max temperature allowed on the: Absolute max temperature allowed on the device
featureDescriptions.Min temperature limit set on the device: Min temperature limit set on the device
featureDescriptions.Max temperature limit set on the device: Max temperature limit set on the device

featureNames.abs_min_heat_setpoint_limit: 绝对最小加热设定点限制
featureNames.abs_max_heat_setpoint_limit: 绝对最大加热设定点限制

groups.new_group_id_placeholder: 如有必要，指定群组 ID

map.help_coordinator_link_description: 实线表示连接到协调器
map.help_lqi_description: 链接质量在0-255之间（越高越好），带/的数值代表多种类型的链接
map.help_router_links_description: 虚线表示连接到路由设备
map.loading: 根据您的网络规模，这可能需要10秒到2分钟的时间。

ota.empty_ota_message: 你没有支持 OTA 的设备

donation_text: 你好, %username%, 在这里你可以感谢我们的辛勤工作

zigbee.update_Home_assistant_entity_id: 更新 Home Assistant 实体 ID

settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant integration (MQTT discove: Home Assistant 集成 (MQTT 发现)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Allow new devices to join (re-applied at: 允许新设备加入(重启时应用)
你可以自定义外部转换器来支持DIY设备
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Options for active devices (routers/main: 有效设备的选项(路由/总线)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an active device will b: 活动设备被标记为离线的时间，以分钟为单位
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Options for passive devices (mostly batt: 无源设备的选择（大部分是电池供电）
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Time after which an passive device will: 被动设备被标记为离线的时间，以分钟为单位
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Checks whether devices are online/offlin: 检查设备是否在线/离线
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate of: 用于签署服务器和客户端证书的CA的SSL/TLS证书的绝对路径
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS key for client-: 客户端身份验证的SSL/TLS密钥的绝对路径
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Absolute path to SSL/TLS certificate for: 客户端身份验证的SSL/TLS证书的绝对路径
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT server authentication user: MQTT服务器身份验证用户名
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disable retain for all send messages. ON: 禁用所有发送消息的保留。只有在你的MQTT代理不支持保留消息时才启用（例如AWS IoT Core、Azure IoT Hub、Google Cloud IoT Core、IBM Watson IoT Platform）。启用将破坏Home Assistant的集成。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Location of the adapter. To autodetect t: 适配器的位置，如果需要z2m自动检测，请设置为null
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Disable LED of the adapter if supported: 如果支持的话禁用适配器的LED
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Adapter type, not needed unless you are: 适配器类型，除非遇到问题否侧不需要
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Allow only certain devices to join the n: 只允许某些设备加入网络（通过ieeeAddr）。请注意，所有不在允许设备列表上的设备都将从网络中被删除!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Transmit power of adapter, only availabl: 适配器的发射功率，仅适用于Z-Stack（CC253*/CC2652/CC1352）适配器，CC2652=5dbm，CC1352 最大=20dbm（默认5dbm）
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Examples when 'state' of a device is pub: 当设备的 "状态 "被发布时的例子 json: topic: 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb' payload '{"state": "ON"}' 属性: topic 'zigbee2mqtt/my_bulb/state' payload 'ON' attribute_and_json: both json and attribute (see above)
settingsSchemaDescriptions.ZigBee pan ID, changing requires repairi: ZigBee pan ID，改变需要重新配对所有设备!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee extended pan ID, changing require: Zigbee扩展的pan ID，改变需要重新配对所有的设备!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee channel, changing requires repair: Zigbee 信道，改变需要重新配对所有设备! (注意：使用 ZLL 信道：11、15、20或25，以避免出现问题）。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.MQTT message payload will contain all at: MQTT消息的有效载荷将包含所有的属性，而不仅仅是改变的属性。当通过Home Assistan集成时，必须为true。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Persist cached state, only used when cac: 保存缓存状态，只在cache_state: true时使用。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Send cached state on startup, only used: 启动时发送缓存状态，仅在cache_state: true时使用。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Create symlink to current logs in the lo: 在日志目录中创建指向当前日志的符号链接
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Output location of the log, leave empty: 日志的输出位置，留空表示不记录日志。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Log file name, can also contain timestam: 日志文件名称，也可以包含时间戳
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Baud rate speed for serial port, this ca: 串行端口的波特率速度，这可以是任何固件支持的，但对于Z-Stack和EZSP来说，默认是115200，对于Deconz来说是38400，但请注意，一些EZSP固件需要57600。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.RTS / CTS Hardware Flow Control for seri: 串行端口的RTS / CTS硬件流量控制
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Network encryption key, changing require: 网络加密密钥，改变需要重新配对所有的设备!
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add a last_seen attribute to MQTT messag: 在MQTT消息中增加一个last_seen属性，包含最后一条Zigbee消息的日期/时间
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Add an elapsed attribute to MQTT message: 在MQTT消息中添加一个已过期的属性，包含自上一个消息以来的毫秒数
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant legacy entity attributes,: Home Assistant的传统实体属性，当启用时，Zigbee2MQTT将为每个实体添加状态属性，这是它已经创建的独立实体和设备的补充。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Adapter concurrency (e.g. 2 for CC2531 o: 适配器并发（例如，CC2531为2，CC26X2R1为16）（默认：空，使用推荐值）。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Use IKEA TRADFRI OTA test server, see OT: 使用宜家特鲁菲OTA测试服务器，见OTA更新文档
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant legacy triggers, when ena: Home Assistant的传统触发器，当启用后，Zigbee2mqtt将发送一个空的'action'或'click'，当发送之后。一个'sensor_action'和'sensor_click'将被发现
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The port on the host that syslog is runn: syslog运行在主机上的端口，默认为syslogd的默认端口。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The path to the syslog dgram socket (i.e: 到syslog dgram套接字的路径（即/dev/log或/var/run/syslog for OS X）。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.PID of the process that log messages are: 日志信息所来自的进程的PID（默认为process.pid）。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Host to indicate that log messages are c: 表示日志信息来自的主机（默认：localhost）。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The type of the syslog protocol to use (: 要使用的syslog协议的类型（默认：BSD，也有效：5424）。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The end of line character to be added to: 要添加到信息末尾的行尾字符（默认值：信息不作修改）。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Your device may request a check for a ne: 你的设备可能要求检查新的固件更新。这个值决定了实际联系第三方服务器以寻找固件更新的频率。该值以分钟为单位设置，默认为1天。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Zigbee devices may request a firmware up: Zigbee设备可能会请求固件更新，并且经常这样做，导致Zigbee2MQTT联系到第三方服务器。如果你禁用了这些设备发起的检查，你仍然可以手动发起一个固件更新检查。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Used in the MQTT topic of a device. By d: 在设备的MQTT主题中使用。默认情况下是设备的ID
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Sets the MQTT Message Expiry in seconds,: 以秒为单位设置MQTT消息过期时间，确保将mqtt.version设置为5。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Protects unique payload values of specif: 保护指定有效载荷属性的唯一有效载荷值在去抖动时间内不被覆盖
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Filter attributes from optimistic publis: 当调用/设置时，从乐观的发布有效载荷中过滤属性。(如果乐观被设置为false，则没有影响）。
从发布有效载荷中过滤属性。
settingsSchemaDescriptions.The user-defined device icon for the fro: 用户为前端定义的设备图标。它可以是一个图片的链接（而不是一个文件的路径）或base64编码的数据URL，如：image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB3aW....R0aD
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Location of override OTA index file: Location of override OTA index file
settingsSchemaDescriptions.URL on which the frontend can be reached: URL on which the frontend can be reached, currently only used for the Home Assistant device configuration page
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Output location of the log, leave empty: Output location of the log, leave empty to suppress logging
settingsSchemaDescriptions.Home Assistant legacy triggers, when ena: Home Assistant legacy triggers, when enabled Zigbee2mqt will send an empty 'action' or 'click' after one has been send. A 'sensor_action' and 'sensor_click' will be discovered

settingsSchemaTitles.Whitelist (deprecated, use passlist): 白名单（已弃用，使用允许设备列表）
settingsSchemaTitles.Ban (deprecated, use blocklist): 黑名单（已弃用，使用阻止设备列表）
settingsSchemaTitles.Home Assistant legacy entity attributes: Home Asistant 传统实体属性
settingsSchemaTitles.IKEA TRADFRI OTA use test url: 宜家特鲁菲OTA  使用测试URL
settingsSchemaTitles.Options that are applied to all devices: 对所有设备有效的设置
settingsSchemaTitles.IKEA TRADFRI OTA use test url (deprecate: 宜家特鲁菲OTA  使用测试URL(不建议使用)
settingsSchemaTitles.Experimental (deprecated): 实验性设置(不建议设置)
